name: Seek the Truth with Lisa Quiz | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
forensic pathologist.

	Lisa O'Malley is the middle child in the family of seven.

false.

	To date, Lisa has a ferret, a parakeet, guppies, and an iguana. The mole she found at Quinn's ranch in 'The Guardian' was given to an elementary class.

questions.text: Was Lisa injured in this book?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Lisa was impaled while looking for evidence in a burned house. She was lucky because a few inches to the left or the right would have paralyzed her for life or killed her. Then she was hurt again at the end of the book when her brother Stephen had to perform a tracheotomy on her.

Jack.

	Jack punched him in the parking lot of the hospital after he found out that Quinn was with Lisa when she was hurt. Jack also broke Lisa's ex-boyfriend's nose when he found out that Kevin wanted her to return to being a 'regular' doctor.

questions.text: What was significant about the cold case Quinn was working on?
questions.explanation:
Lisa was involved in it.

	Quinn had been told by a friend of his, Lincoln, that the grave of the dead woman had been exhumed by Lisa three years earlier.

questions.text: Which O'Malley sister did Quinn admit to asking out first, making Lisa the last O'Malley sister to be asked out by him?
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	All of the O'Malleys thought that Quinn had asked out Jennifer first, but Quinn admitted to Lisa in the book that he asked out Rachel first and Rachel sent him to Jennifer, making Lisa the last sister he asked out.

questions.text: What color convertible did Lisa want?
questions.explanation:
blue.

	Lisa was the only one that didn't know about the red convertible the O'Malleys were getting Jennifer for a wedding present. They didn't tell her because talks too much. After she saw it, Lisa told Quinn that she wanted a blue one.

questions.text: Lisa's brother Jack died in a fire that was set in her house.
questions.explanation:
false.

	A fire was started in Lisa's house to scare her into backing off of the case she was working on. Jack went into the fire thinking Lisa was inside, but it turned out that she wasn't in the house when the fire started. Jack wasn't hurt, but all of Lisa's pets died.

questions.text: Whose room did Lisa actually raid in the Houston hotel, thinking it was Marcus' room she was raiding?
questions.explanation:
Dave's room.

	Lisa thought she was taking all of the toiletries out of Marcus' room so he would have to buy new things, but it turned out that Marcus and Quinn played a trick on her and she ended up going into Dave's room instead of Marcus'.

questions.text: Lisa became a Christian at the end of her story.
questions.explanation:
true.

	Lisa O'Malley is the fourth O'Malley to accept Jesus.
